events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The candidate's profile has been categorised under Engineering due to their extensive experience in software development and cloud infrastructure.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to oversee the candidate's hiring process and coordinate upcoming screening activities.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well, demonstrating solid knowledge in software engineering principles and relevant technical skills.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm about the role and the companyâ€™s engineering culture.
A technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with the senior engineers next week to further assess coding and system design skills.
